Trade/Device Name(s): VALIDATE PSA Calibration Verification / Linearity Test Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VALIDATE PSA Calibration Verification / Linearity Test Kit as an assayed/unassayed human serum quality control material for PSA and fPSA linearity and calibration verification on automated systems
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use in quantitative determination of linearity, calibration verification and verification of reportable range for total and free PSA on automated systems
